Table of Contents

Name

AuGetScratchFlow - get a scratch flow

Synopsis

#include <audio/audiolib.h>

AuFlowID AuGetScratchFlow(server, status) AuServer *server;
AuStatus *status; /* RETURN */

Arguments

server
Specifies the connection to the audio server.
status
If non-NULL, flush the output buffer and return the status from the server.

Description

AuGetScratchFlow gets one of the pre-allocated flow ID's if availible or creates a new flow if not and returns the flow ID or AuNone if there was an error.

Errors

AuBadAlloc.

See Also

AuCreateFlow, AuReleaseScratchFlow.

audiolib - Network Audio System C Language Interface
